alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of southwestern Barrow, east central Gwinnett and northwestern Walton Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Harbin, or near Lawrenceville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible, in addition to what has already fallen. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Winder, Auburn, Dacula, Grayson, Bethlehem, Carl, Fort Yargo State Park, Bold Springs, County Line, Windsor, Harbin, Nicholasville, Campton and Russell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
